title: New: Hypno Safari – Shade
content:
Few people have enjoyed a past twelve months as productive and as exhilarating as Logan Hyde.

Tour guitarist with close-friend Trevor Powers aka Boise sensation Youth Lagoon, who’ve just been announced as one of the support acts for Death Cab For Cutie’s extensive US tour, as well as being tweeted by Jessica Alba, it’s been a year that has surpassed any of their expectations. Now Hyde has re-worked a track from his solo-project Hypno Safari, to wondrous effect, and whilst I don’t normally repost tracks, however Shade needs to be heard.

With a riff as addictive as the likes of Youth Lagoon’s Montana, yet with a grittier element thrown into them mix for good measure, Hypno Safari embodies the sort of honesty and integrity that we’ve come to expect from Boise musicians. Check out Shade below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
